plot: Immigration from the sub-Saharan regions of Africa was seen as a temporary phenomenon in the 70's. Since then, it has become a social reality represented by the new black African population in Catalonia: Black Catalans or Catalan Blacks.
title: Catalunya negra
plot_es: Immigration from the sub-Saharan regions of Africa was seen as a temporary phenomenon in the 70's. Since then, it has become a social reality represented by the new black African population in Catalonia: Black Catalans or Catalan Blacks.
plot_en: Immigration from the sub-Saharan regions of Africa was seen as a temporary phenomenon in the 70's. Since then, it has become a social reality represented by the new black African population in Catalonia: Black Catalans or Catalan Blacks.
